channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Common Log File System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Common Log File System

item.title: CVE-2018-0846|2024-08-05T03:44:10.442Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20common%20log%20file%20system
item.description: The Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) driver in Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 and RT 8.1, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012 and R2, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703 and 1709, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server, version 1709 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to how objects in memory are handled, aka "Windows Common Log File System Driver Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0844.

item.title: CVE-2018-0844|2024-08-05T03:44:10.386Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20common%20log%20file%20system
item.description: The Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) driver in Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 and RT 8.1, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012 and R2, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703 and 1709, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server, version 1709 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to how objects in memory are handled, aka "Windows Common Log File System Driver Elevation Of Privilege Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0846.
